title: Add Secure Payment section before Registration Form

requirements.summary: Create a 'Secure Payment' section component displaying UPI payment instructions with a copy-to-clipboard button, and insert it before the RegistrationForm in App.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Secure Payment' section appears on the page directly above the Registration Form section.
The section displays the heading 'Secure Payment'.
The UPI ID text 'Pay the entry fee to the following UPI ID to participate: 8728872927@fam' is visible.
A 'Copy ID' button is present; clicking it copies '8728872927@fam' to the clipboard.
After clicking 'Copy ID', the button text briefly changes to 'Copied!' as feedback.
The note 'Please keep the transaction screenshot ready for the form' is displayed beneath the UPI ID.
The section background uses a slightly red tint (dark red) consistent with the Free Fire red/black theme.
The section is fully mobile-responsive and matches the existing site typography and styling conventions.

file_operations.description: Create a new SecurePayment section component that renders: (1) a heading 'Secure Payment' using Orbitron font, (2) instructional text displaying the UPI ID '8728872927@fam' with Rajdhani font, (3) a 'Copy ID' button that uses the Clipboard API to copy the UPI ID and shows 'Copied!' feedback for 2 seconds, (4) a note about keeping the transaction screenshot ready. Style with a dark red background (e.g., bg-[#1a0505] or bg-red-950/10), red accent borders, angular design elements, and ensure full mobile responsiveness matching the existing Free Fire theme conventions (Orbitron/Rajdhani fonts, red-glowing effects, sharp corners).

Import the new SecurePayment component and insert it immediately before the RegistrationForm component in the render tree. Ensure the section is wrapped with proper spacing and is scrollable/accessible via the existing navigation structure. Do not modify any other sections or their ordering.
